content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”masonry-portfolio location-portfolio” css=”.vc_custom_1563615609227{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1515636297694{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-6″]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-6″]

Our Unique Small Business Website Development Process

Are you starting a local business in Black Rock? Confetti Design specialises in creating beautiful and high performing websites that can help your business grow! You may have a physical store in the beachside suburbs of Black Rock or you’re starting out an ecommerce business at home—Confetti Design can create a website concept that will fit your business needs!

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][vc_column_text]VIEW MORE OF OUR WORK[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1513007553262{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text el_class=”text-not-caps”]

Confetti Design services in Black Rock

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564461670055{padding-right: 5% !important;padding-left: 5% !important;}”]

We will help you build your e-commerce website from ground up. Our retail and e-commerce experience is invaluable in helping your business be a success.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_separator color=”custom” el_width=”10″ accent_color=”#ca0043″][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

[vc_row_inner el_class=”services-location”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Web Design

[vc_column_text]Looking for good designers and professional developers? Confetti Design offers a hands on design and development Service that will help you accomplish an amazing client experience resulting in great conversions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Branding

[vc_column_text]We provide more than just website development, your branding matters and we can ensure you present a consistent online brand. Making sure all your customer touch-points present the same brand messaging and visuals is our passion.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

SEO

[vc_column_text]Getting your site within the first 3 positions on the first page of Google is every businesses goal. We ensure your website goes live with best practise optimisation and then if you are serious about ranking we can help. Our SEO partner is the best Melbourne based Search Engine Optimisation company we know.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″]

Shopify Developer

[vc_column_text]Shopify is one of the best platforms for e-commerce, no doubt and we are the right people to help you with your online business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563677314464{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}” el_class=”location-slider-portfolio”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1563592372523{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Characteristics of a great website for your business in Black Rock

A website serves a virtual front door for your business. Having a great website not only gives you an online presence and a chance to sell around the clock, it also helps build your reputation. We have compiled the characteristics of a great website to help you gain some ideas when you conceptualise your own Black Rock business website.

[vc_column_text]

Confetti Design has more than five years of experience creating eye-catching websites that convert, and we can do the same for your business.

We aim for you to get more visitors in your physical shop or shoppers for your e-commerce website.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1563603813437{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-white steps location-factors”][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604136910{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_01.jpg?id=10889) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg1 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540595653{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Well designed layout

An excellent appearance of your Black Rock e-commerce website will be the number one characteristic you should aim for. This means you lay the information out in order of importance. What do you want your visitor to do know first and do first? Place these elements at the top of the page.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604143056{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_02.jpg?id=10890) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg2 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540618054{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Fine tuned functionality

The next most important characteristic of the website for your Black Rock business is its functionality. This means that the buttons should work correctly as expected, videos are playing without hassle, and menu items are linked to the correct pages.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604148917{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/steps_03.jpg?id=10891) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg3 text-plus”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540663171{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Relevant and quality content

After capturing your audience’s attention once they land, your next step is to create content that allows them to remain interested with your business. Your website visitors should have a reason to stay engaged with your website. This will increase the possibility of them buying on your e-commerce platform or visiting your retail shop in Black Rock or using your services.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1563604156298{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 100px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/steps_04aaa.jpg?id=11317) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”text-bg4″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540707571{margin-right: 5% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 5% !important;}”]

Contact Information and Location are Easily Seen

Buyers from your Black Rock e-commerce business might need more information about your products or will need to clarify delivery options. Make your contact information easy to find and give them as much detail as possible. Adding a map to your contact page is really helpful. Always include your email, phone number as well as a contact form.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1563677178660{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep gray-bg”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1563677168639{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1564540780544{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”]

Confetti Design caters to clients from Black Rock, Cheltenham, Moorabbin, and nearby areas.
Our unparalleled web design and development services have proven to work with our clients!

Below are the small business web design testimonials from our valued clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”testimonial-location”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1563677152717{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

Stacey Currie

I had been quoted from $1k to $10k, I had no idea who to trust. Luckily I was referred by someone I trust 100%, who trust Johannah 100%, and I know why. I am very grateful.

Stacey Currie

I still can’t believe my vision is here; I feel extremely proud of my new website and branding. I felt embarrassed of my old branding but now I am so proud to share what Johannah and the team created.

Personal Brand Expert

One feature I loved was Johannah's availability and prompt response to any query no matter how big or small. Confetti's service is always with genuine smile and her positive attitude and outlook made the process fun!

Suzie Lightfoot

Coach Central

I am impressed with how well Johannah nailed my brief without one face-to-face meeting. I highly recommend her to create a website you will love.

Cindy Turner

Wedding Honey

Johannah has produced a beautiful and effective new website for our small business in a short amount of time. Her professionalism, kindness and encouragement is appreciated.

Ray & Sharon Tolcher

Miei Fiori

Johannah took her time to understand our vision before coming back with suggestions that not only meet our requirements but are relevant, current and forward in it's application.

Rob Greca & Lyly Greca

Sarah Trevathan Coach

The process has been stress-free and actually very enjoyable! I'm also delighted with the finished result of my website.

Sarah Trevathan

What's My Style

I regularly receive compliments on my branding, website and the stunning business cards and cannot recommend Johannah and Confetti Designs highly enough.

Nicky McMillan
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Contact us for an instant over-the-phone quote.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
